feed.title: SimpleX Chat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.0.3
entry.content:
New in v6.0.3: - fix rare delivery bug.

v6 release announcement: https://simplex.chat/blog/20240814-simplex-chat-vision-funding-v6-private-routing-new-user-experience.html

Commits: - core: 6.0.3.0 (simplexmq 6.0.2.0) - ios: update core library - 6.0.3: ios 235, android 235, desktop 64

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.0.4
entry.content:
New in v6.0.4: - reduced traffic and battery usage on unstable networks. - desktop: only offer the next versions for update, based on SerVer ordering. - UI fixes.

Commits: - ui: fix Debug delivery (#4757) - ios: remove unnecessary protocols (#4763) - android, desktop: items padding and min height (#4767) - android, desktop: using SemVer when checking for updates (#4768) - desktop: show only AppImage download option for those who running AppImage (#4774) - flatpak: update metainfo (#4784) - core: call uuid (#4777) - ios: make CallKit calls fire in time after cold start (#4787) - fix android simulator build (#4795) - android, desktop: improvement to a lock UI (#4769) - android, desktop: fix loading chat items when search was not empty (#4802) - core: 6.0.4.0 (simplexmq 6.0.3.0) - ios: update core library - android, desktop: small enhancements to new chat sheet (#4803) - 6.0.4: ios 236, android 237, desktop 65

Android APKs:

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.0.5
entry.content:
New in v6.0.5: - support generic SOCKS proxies. - fix calls stuck in "connecting..." state. - update to Android API 34. - fixes.

Please note: v6.0.5 is older than previously released v6.1.0-beta.1. Only install it if you have v6.0.4.

Commits: - docs: FAQ on deletion of sent messages and read receipts (#4470) - faq: private message routing (#4807) - desktop: fix vlc dependency (#4809) - flatpak: update metainfo (#4811) - android, desktop: group info remembers scroll position and search (#4817) - android, desktop: remove slash from strings (#4818) - android, desktop: fix crash when window is small in chat view (#4819) - android, desktop: making list items unique (#4812) - multiplatform: fix deleted contacts with conversations being identified as contact cards (#4828) - android: fix initializing WorkManager (#4833) - blog: fix grammar error (#4846) - core: allow deleting user when user record in agent database was deleted (#4851) - fix incorrect error of migration to device (#4852) - multiplatform: fix delete messages alert (#4862) - android: remove Worker provider's interface implementation (#4874) - core: support different SOCKS proxy authentication modes (#4886) - core: reduce max message sizes (#4882) - android, desktop: fix always connecting state in call (#4911) - android: target API level 34 (Android 14) (#4697) - ci: dont build when files in core do not change (#4797) - core: 6.0.5.0 (simplexmq 6.0.5.0) - desktop: fix vlc dependency (2) (#4869) - ios: SOCKS proxy UI (#4893) - android, desktop: proxy configuration includes credentials (#4892) - ios: update core library - 6.0.5: ios 239, android 241, desktop 68

Android APKs:

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.1.0
entry.content:
New in v6.1:

Better security: - SimpleX protocols reviewed by Trail of Bits. - security improvements (don't worry, there is nothing critical there).

Better calls: - you can switch audio and video during the call - share the screen from desktop app.

Better iOS notifications: - improved delivery, reduced traffic usage. - more improvements are coming soon!

Better user experience: - switch chat profile for 1-time invitations. - customizable message shape. - better message dates. - forward up to 20 messages at once. - delete or moderate up to 200 messages.

The protocols review by Trail of Bits and release announcement will be published on October 14 afternoon here: https://simplex.chat/blog/20241014-simplex-network-v6-1-security-review-better-calls-user-experience.html

Commits: - ios: allow for chat profile selection on new chat screen (#4729) - core: multi forward api (#4704) - ios: multi send & forward api (#4739) - multiplatform: multi send & forward api (#4745) - core: 6.1.0.0 - ios: connection profile search, incognito info in selection list and improved loader (#4744) - ios: update core library - core: add more multi send api tests (#4750) - ios: fix possible race between incognito set and profile change in conn profile picker (#4752) - android: target API level 34 (Android 14) (#4697) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: remove unnecessary protocols (#4763) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: update core library - ios: time based message grouping (#4743) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: add chat message tail and roundness settings; date separators (#4764) - android, desktop: allow for chat profile selection on new chat screen (#4741) - core: fix associated agent user for recreated connections (#4771) - ios: show correct message times (#4779) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: show member role on the right (#4783) - ios: remove tails from group invitations (#4792) - Merge branch 'stable' - ci: dont build when files in core do not change (#4797) - ios: fix inaccurate floating unread counters in chat message view (#4781) - ios: fix crash regression (#4800) - docs: FAQ on deletion of sent messages and read receipts (#4470) - Merge branch 'stable' - faq: private message routing (#4807) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: update core library - website: fix links - desktop: fix vlc dependency (#4809) - ios: show received messages using checkmark with slash (#4816) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: cache base64 images (#4827) - ios: attach share sheet to the topmost view controller (to support sharing from nested sheets) (#4830) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: make message information on media readable (#4820) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: revert showing date in chat list timestamp (#4834) - ios: move caching images to background thread, dont use main thread scheduler for marking items read (#4840) - core: optimize marking chat items as read, batch API (#4843) - core: allow deleting user when user record in agent database was deleted (#4851) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: add floating date separator (#4801) - core: update simplexmq (ntf encoding) (#4853) - ios: new user picker (#4821) - multiplatform: fix delete messages alert (#4862) - Merge branch 'stable' - android, desktop: new user picker (#4796) - core: bulk forward missing files error handling (#4860) - docs: remove outdated latest version number from downloads (#4854) - Revert "core: bulk forward missing files error handling (#4860)" - desktop: fix vlc dependency (2) (#4869) - core: plan forwarding chat items, api types (#4865) - core: update simplexmq 6.0.4.0 - core: fix ForwardConfirmation encoding (#4872) - android: fix showing logs from core (#4880) - core: cleanup empty file on error; check file status on forward (#4878) - core: test forwarding image preview without attached file (#4877) - Merge branch 'stable' - core: 6.1.0.0 (simplexmq 6.1.0.0) - ios: update user profile sheet design (#4871) - ui: translations (#4889) - Translated using Weblate (Spanish) (#4891) - ios: update core library - core: migrate SOCKS proxy settings (#4894) - desktop: less distance from edge to call icon (#4898) - ios: SOCKS proxy UI (#4893) - core: update statuses of all batched messages on SENT, RCVD (#4888) - ui: support CRChatItemsStatusesUpdated response (#4890) - android, desktop: proxy configuration includes credentials (#4892) - Merge branch 'stable' - core: 6.1.0.1 - ios: update core library - core: 6.1.0.2, update min versions for remote access to 6.1.0.2 - ios: update core library - 6.1-beta.0: ios 237, android 239, desktop 66 - android, desktop: reset incognito on profile picker (#4903) - android, desktop: compose 1.6.11 (#4902) - ios: bulk forward (#4857) - desktop: cleanup current invitation when closing new chat sheet by pressing on center modal (#4904) - android, desktop: catch URI creation errors (#4901) - Revert "android, desktop: compose 1.6.11 (#4902)" - android, desktop: bulk forward (#4868) - Merge branch 'stable' - core: send errors processing (#4910) - core: 6.1.0.3 - ui: translations (#4915) - website: translations (#4916) - 6.1-beta.1: ios 238, android 240, desktop 67 - core: process ERRS event (#4896) - ios: use translation in dropdown - core: save the time user profile was opened at to order in ui (#4920) - ios: scrolling user profiles (#4909) - ios: fix keyboard loosing focus when forward search results are empty (#4895) - ios: display year in chat for previous years (#4919) - docs: iOS notifications in FAQ (#4879) - android, desktop: member name position depends on length (#4918) - android: fix status bar color after hiding call (#4928) - core: xrcp encryption with forward secrecy (#4926) - ios: reduce scroll stickiness threshold for user profiles to 32px - core: update simplexmq - desktop: wrap content of remote hosts on overflow (#4923) - ios: fix theme customization changing color mode (#4936) - Merge branch 'stable' - core: fix reactions not being read on item updates (#4938) - core: use broker ts for member profile update item ts (#4940) - ios: fix add members search keyboard focus (#4934) - android, desktop: scrolling user profiles (#4939) - core: 6.1.0.4 (simplexmq 6.1.0.1) - ios: avoid message changing width when sent/received ticks appear (#4945) - android, desktop: calls switching from audio to video and back (#4814) - android, desktop: time based message grouping and day separators (#4914) - ios: update core library - 6.1-beta.2: ios 240, android 243, desktop 69 - android, desktop: fix Safari sound (#4947) - readme: update group links - android, desktop: make space on chat bubble end consistent (#4946) - core: update simplexmq (#4952) - android, desktop: support old Android WebViews (up to 69) (#4953) - android, desktop: make audio call default type of call on desktop (#4954) - android, desktop: add floating date separator to chatview (#4951) - core: 6.1.0.5 (simplexmq: 6.1.0.3) - ios: update core library - 6.1-beta.3: ios 241, android 244, desktop 70 - readme: update group links - android, desktop: add chat message tail and roundness settings (#4958) - core: add chat message tail and roundness settings (#4977) - ui: translations (#4956) - Translated using Weblate (Portuguese (Brazil)) (#4959) - ios: prevent image encoding from blocking the UI (#4966) - core, ios: try to get next ntf message to get expected (#4962) - ios: hide user picker sheet instantly, when opening another sheet (#4927) - core: update simplexmq (transport block encryption) (#4881) - ios: fix animator crash (#4990) - ios: fix appearance settings scroll hang (#4967) - cli: option to use web port 443 with SMP servers when port is not specified (#4942) - core: 6.1.0.6 - android, desktop: thread-safe terminal items and floating terminal improvements (#4992) - ios: calls switching from audio to video and back (#4964) - core: add missing indexes (#4993) - core: 6.1.0.7 - ios: update library - android, desktop: additional options for transport isolation mode (#4994) - ui: do not enable speaker in calls when contact turned on video (#4998) - android, desktop: checking for camera in calls and handle uninitialized call (#4997) - ui: translations (#5002) - website: translations (#5003) - 6.1-beta.4: ios 242, android 245, desktop 71 - Merge branch 'stable' - ui: rely on different value in stats when checking calls media (#5007) - core: test db indexes (#4999) - ui: allow deleting and moderating up to 200 messages (#5010) - ios: v6.1 whats new (#5005) - ios: fix group member sheet load animation (#5008) - ios: export localizations - android, desktop: fix profile switching failure handling (#5014) - ui: translations (#5015) - ios: fix remaining bugs in calls (#5013) - ios: fix ocassional error on getSubsTotal (#5021) - multiplatform: disable chat buttons on user picker when chat is stopped (#5017) - ios: fix empty qr code reader when swapping to connect via link (#5016) - ios: fix not showing link creation and add group members pages (#5020) - desktop: fix typescript sdk ability to send / receive messages (#4970) - sdk: fix test - android: re-apply custom language when webview appears (#5022) - android, desktop: don't stop audio track on Android in calls (#5024) - core: do not regenerate key when accepting connection to avoid invalidating invitation link on bad networks (#5018) - core: 6.1.0.8 (simplexmq: 6.1.0.7) - android: hide mic icon when mic is disabled (#5025) - ui: translations (#5026) - 6.1-beta.5: ios 243, android 246, desktop 72 - blog: v6.1 announcement placeholder (#5004) - core: associate new contact with all corresponding members on member contact re-creation (e.g. after it was merged to many members and then deleted) (#5028) - ios: fix link previews to be enabled by default - directory service: list pending groups (#5029) - core: 6.1.0.9 - ios: dont show tails for moderated and blocked items unless revealed (#5030) - ui: translations (#5031) - 6.1: ios 244, android 247, desktop 73

Android APKs:

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.1.1
entry.content:
New in v6.1.1: - additional error reporting. - iOS fixes.

Commits: - docs/smp-server: update to latest changes (#4960) - docs: correction - flatpak: update metainfo (#5039) - blog: v6.1 and security review announcement (#5040) - docs: fix links - ios: replace revealed bindings with constant value (#5027) - ui: quota error description (#5037) - blog: wired's attack on privacy (#5063) - ios: fix theme import file picker (#5048) - ios: fix sheets dismissing during biometric authentication (#5062) - ios: fix navigation title redaction after biometric authentication (#5065) - ios: fix chat not loading if initial page has too many merged items (#5066) - ios: optimise ComposeView rendering (#5042) - core: ntf server - core, ui: add SMP STORE error (#5071) - core: 6.1.1.0 (simplexmq: 6.1.1.0) - ios: fix changing user via notification (#5069) - 6.1.1: ios 245, android 249, desktop 74

Android APKs:

SHA2-512(simplex-aarch64.apk/simplex.apk)= d6351246a841549f98cf683333bccf037904212952f0c00f9c4770bc30cb606c0e949e3b2d389feba45f86e9bca5c9383886356541ecc574c02b0bab160cfedd
